content_sections.content:
The HTML DOM allows JavaScript to change the style of HTML elements. Changing HTML Style To change the style of an HTML element, use this syntax: document.getElementById( id ).style. property = new style The following example changes the style of a

Using Events The HTML DOM allows you to execute code when an event occurs.
